lead_paragraph: Jin Joo Hong, a South Korean playing in her first L.P.G.A. event, shot a five-under-par 67 yesterday to take a four-stroke lead halfway through the Kolon-Hana Bank Championship in Gyeongju, South Korea.
snippet: Jin Joo Hong, a South Korean playing in her first L.P.G.A. event, shot a five-under-par 67 yesterday to take a four-stroke lead halfway through the Kolon-Hana Bank Championship in Gyeongju, South Korea.
